GitHub

About Me

I am a entry level 'Full Stack Web Developer' building more and more experience every day! On the front end I have experience building and framing full web applications with HTML, CSS (and/or multiple CSS frameworks), and DOM manipulation using JavaScript or jQuerry. On the back end I have experience building terminal applications using node. I am also comfortable with ES6 syntax, Object-oriented programming, and Test-driven development.

Work

Austin Date Night ❤️

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind

Don't know what to do tonight? Use Austin Date Night to find the top places (and what people are saying about them) for what type of entertainment you are in the mood for!

View Project on GitHub

JavaScript Fundamentals Quiz

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6

Test your basic JavaScript knowlede with this short quiz that will keep track of your score based off of time in order to keep track of your improvements! Incorrect answers will take away from overall time.

Portfolio Generator

Built With: JavaScript, ES6, Node

Takes user input to create a dynamic HTML portfolio page to display user's information and list of projects

View Project on GitHub

Password Generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Generates a completley random password based off of user specified characters (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special), at user specified length (between 8 - 128 characters).

View Project on GitHub

Git-It-Done

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Enter any GitHub username a pull up any open issues that may need your help! Or you may choose to select a language you think you can help in, and view the top open issues people are working on. Also, usefull for simply checking if all of your personal GitHub issues are caught up without having to cycle through every project individualy.

View Project on GitHub

Work Day Scheduler

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuerry, Bootsrap

Help organize the work day by laying out your work day in this easy work day scheduler. Simply enter your task in the relative time slot and lock it in with the button to the right. Timeblocks are color coded based on time status for when those hours start to sneak up on you!

View Project on GitHub
